1.SceneDescription: Central Perk, everyone is there as Rachel enters.

lines.Line: Hey, you guys! Guess what? Barry and Mindy are getting a divorce
(To Ross) What is the matter with you?
Oh sorry, I hear divorce I immediately go to Ross. (To Rachel)NEWLINEWho-who’s Barry and Mindy
Barry was the guy that I was almost married and Mindy was my bestNEWLINEfriend
Ohh-oh, wasn’t he cheating on you with her
Ohh-oh, wasn’t he cheating on you with her
Ohh-oh, wasn’t he cheating on you with her
Yeah, but that just means that he was falling asleep on top of herNEWLINEinstead of me
Well, apparently she caught him cheating on her with someone else.NEWLINEIsn’t that sad? (Giggles.) God, could you imagine if I actually married him?! I meanNEWLINEhow different would my life be
I know what you mean, I’ve always wondered how different my lifeNEWLINEwould be if-if I’d never gotten divorced
The first time! No seriously, imagine if Carol hadn’t realized sheNEWLINEwas a lesbian
(starts to imagine it) I can’t. I keep seeing it the good way

I’d bet I’d still be doing my kara-tay. (That’s karate,NEWLINEhe’s just saying it that way.) Towards the end of our marriage I was doing a lot ofNEWLINEkara-tay as a way of releasing the tension from y’know, not doing anything elseNEWLINEphysical
Maybe the problem was you were pronouncing it kara-tay
Maybe the problem was you were pronouncing it kara-tay
And what if I was still fat? (To Chandler) Well, you wouldn’t beNEWLINEdating me, that’s for sure
(simultaneously) Oh yeah! Come on! Yeah right
What, you guys really think that I’m that shallow
No, I just think Monica was that fat
No, I just think Monica was that fat
Hey, imagine if I never got fired off Days Of Our Lives! (ClosesNEWLINEhis eyes to do so.) Oh-hey, there’s Carol again
What if I had had the guts to quit my job? I’d probably beNEWLINEwriting for the New Yorker, getting paid to be funny. But my job’s fun too! INEWLINEmean tomorrow, I-I don’t have to wear a tie
What if I had taken that job at Merrill Lynch
What if I had taken that job at Merrill Lynch
What if I had taken that job at Merrill Lynch
Yeah, I had a massage client who worked there and-and he said I had aNEWLINEknack for stocks
Well why didn’t you take the job
Well why didn’t you take the job
Because at that time you see, I thought everything that rhymed was true.NEWLINESo I thought y’know that if I’d work with stocks, I’d have to live in aNEWLINEbox, and only eat lox, and have a pet fox
Hey, do you guys think that if all those things happened, we’d stillNEWLINEhang out

This is where the opening credits are, but they’re notNEWLINEthe usual opening credits. Oh no! These credits are based on the world that wouldNEWLINEhave been created had all of the above actually happened. It starts out with all of themNEWLINEat the fountain sitting on the couch as Fat Monica runs up and sits on the arm of theNEWLINEcouch, tilting the whole thing towards her. It then goes on to show Rachel’s still aNEWLINEshop-aholic and with Barry. Fat Monica is sweating while cooking and dancing while eatingNEWLINEa donut. Phoebe as the Wall Street shark smoking while on two cell phones. ThenNEWLINEthey’re dancing in the fountain. Joey entering as Dr. Drake Remoray and meeting aNEWLINEgroupie. Chandler trying to write as a bird does its business on his shoulder and fallingNEWLINEasleep while typing. Ross doing some kara-tay and trying to get Carol into bed. AndNEWLINEfinally, some more dancing in the fountain, them all flexing, and the turning out the lampNEWLINEand shutting off all the lights bit from the first season. Just remember one thing, thisNEWLINEis an alternate universe. Everything from every other episode doesn’t apply, forNEWLINEinstance, Ross and Rachel have no history. And in fact have not seen each other in yearsNEWLINEin this world.

2.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Joey, Fat Monica, and her boyfriend are sitting on the couch.NEWLINEMonica’s boyfriend is getting up to get something. For future reference, for the restNEWLINEof this episode Monica’s fat, I won’t be calling her Fat Monica throughout.

lines.Line: So Monica, still going out with Dr. Boring huh
He’s not boring! He’s just-he’s just low key
(returning) Here we go, one Hazelnut Latte. (Hands it toNEWLINEMonica and sits down.
Yeah. Y’know, the hazelnut actually not a nut,NEWLINEit’s a seed
Can anyone else name a well known seed that’s beenNEWLINEmasquerading as a nut
Oh dear God, let me think. (Starts to sarcastically think about it.
Oh I just got another rejection letter. They said my writing wasNEWLINEfunny, just not Archie Comic funny
Y’know what honey? I got to get back to the hospital
Bye-bye. (Gets up to leave.) Oh uh, by the way, the answerNEWLINEis, the Brazil nut. (Exits.
Was his question what’s more boring than him
Was his question what’s more boring than him
Hey man, look sorry about that Archie thing. Do uh, do you need meNEWLINEto give you some money
Hey, I may have no money, but I still have my pride
Hey, I may have no money, but I still have my pride
Maybe Joey doesn’t have to give you the money, TV stars haveNEWLINEassistants right
That’s an idea! (To Chandler) Hey, if I hired an assistant,NEWLINEwould-would you take money from her
No Joey! Chandler could be your assistant! See, he could answer all ofNEWLINEyour fan mail and stuff
That’s great! That would be great! Let’s do that
That’s great! That would be great! Let’s do that
That’s great! That would be great! Let’s do that
I could use the money; it could give me time to write
All right! Now hey, I need to use the bathroom. Since I don’t needNEWLINEany assistance in there, take a break

lines.Character: (As Joey goes to the bathroom, Corporate Phoebe enters. She’s wearing a businessNEWLINEsuit and carrying a briefcase
lines.Line: As Joey goes to the bathroom, Corporate Phoebe enters. She’s wearing a businessNEWLINEsuit and carrying a briefcase.
Joey just hired Chandler to be his assistant

Ohh that’s so sweet! (Her cell phone rings.) Oh! Hang on! (QuicklyNEWLINEgrabs a cigarette and starts to light it as her phone rings.) Hang onnnnnn!!! (Gets theNEWLINEcigarette lighted and answers the phone.) (On phone.) Go!! No! No-no! I said sell when itNEWLINEhits 50! 5-0, it’s a number! It comes after 4-9!! No, it’s okay. It’s okay,NEWLINEyou’re allowed one mistake. Just kidding, you are of course fired

lines.Character: (She hangs up as Ross and Rachel enter
lines.Line: She hangs up as Ross and Rachel enter.

lines.Character: (She hangs up as Ross and Rachel enter
lines.Line: She hangs up as Ross and Rachel enter.

lines.Character: (She hangs up as Ross and Rachel enter
lines.Line: She hangs up as Ross and Rachel enter.
Mon, look who I ran into! (Gestures towards Rachel.

(gets up and gasps) Oh my God! Rachel!! (Rachel is stunned to see thatNEWLINEher long lost friend is still fat.) (Monica goes over and gives Rachel a big bear hug,NEWLINEwhich is quite easy for her.) You look terrific
Ohh, so do you! Did you lose weight? (She’s not quite sure of thatNEWLINEone.
Ohh, so do you! Did you lose weight? (She’s not quite sure of thatNEWLINEone.
You are so sweet to notice! Yes, I lost three and a half pounds
And, and uh, you-you remember my friend Chandler. (Points to him.
And that’s Phoebe over there! (Points to her.
Oh my God, sit down! Sit down! How long as it been since we’ve seenNEWLINEeach other
(answering it) 1987, the day after Christmas, at Sean McMahon’sNEWLINEparty. I played you one of my songs, y’know Interplanetary Courtship Ritual
Oh yeah. Right. So now, are—do you, do you still do music
Oh yeah. Right. So now, are—do you, do you still do music
Sometimes, you should come over (Joey returns from the bathroom) sometime!NEWLINEI’ll play you one of my other
(interrupting him and seeing Joey) Oh my God! Joey Tribbiani from DaysNEWLINEof Our Lives, just walked in here
Rach, he’s a friend of ours
Rach, he’s a friend of ours
Rach, he’s a friend of ours
Rach, he’s a friend of ours
(stunned) You are friends with Dr. Drake Remoray
Well it’s kinda hard to be friends with Drake because of his busyNEWLINEschedule and the fact that he’s not real
(To Rachel) Hey-hey, or I could bring my keyboard over hereNEWLINEsometime
(To Rachel) Hey-hey, or I could bring my keyboard over hereNEWLINEsometime
He’s coming over! He’s coming over
He’s coming over! He’s coming over
(holding a plate of what looks like Rice Crispies Treats) I know,NEWLINEhere-here!! (Hands her the plate.
Ohhh! (Takes the plate.) No! This is my friend Rachel, we went to HighNEWLINESchool together
(giggles and can’t look at him) Hi
(giggles and can’t look at him) Hi
(giggles and can’t look at him) Hi
(still not quite able to look at him) Hi! I love you on that show! INEWLINEwatch you everyday! I mean, when you took out your own kidney to save your ex-wife evenNEWLINEthough she tired to kill you
Well, it’s always nice to meet the fans
Well, it’s always nice to meet the fans
(turning and whispering to Monica) She’s not crazy is she
(To Rachel) So uh, how you doin’

3.SceneDescription: A hospital, Phoebe is recovering from her heart attack as Ross, Monica, andNEWLINEChandler are there to comfort and support her.

lines.Line: Come on Pheebs, it’s not that bad! Y’know most people would beNEWLINEexcited if they didn’t have to work for a couple of weeks
Most people don’t like their jobs, I love my job! I have notNEWLINEbeen working for three hours and I’m already going crazy. I miss Joan
Honey, having a heart attack is nature’s way of telling you to slowNEWLINEit down

I always thought having a heart attack was nature’s way ofNEWLINEtelling you to die! (Phoebe glares at him.) But you’re not gonna die. I mean, you areNEWLINEgoing to die, but you’re not gonna die today. I wish I was dead
Let’s take a walk. (They start to leave.) Y’know maybe youNEWLINEshould consider writing for Talking Out of Your Ass magazine! (They exit.
Let’s take a walk. (They start to leave.) Y’know maybe youNEWLINEshould consider writing for Talking Out of Your Ass magazine! (They exit.
(To Ross) So what’s going on with you
Well umm, I’ve been doing a lot more of my kara-tay
Well umm, I’ve been doing a lot more of my kara-tay
Still going through that dry spell with Carol
How long has it been since you had sex
Maybe you need to spice things up a little
I don’t know. You could tie her up, she could tie you up; you couldNEWLINEeat stuff off each other
Y’know, dirty talk, ménage à trois, toys
Roll playing… You could be the warden; she could be the prisoner.NEWLINEYou could be the pirate; she could be the wench
Okay, I think I got it
Okay, I think I got it
Okay, I think I got it
Yeah! Or too, you could be two stockbrokers andNEWLINEyou’re-you’re-you’re rolling around naked on the trading floor andNEWLINEeverybody’s watching! (Ross looks at her.) It never happened

4.SceneDescription: Silvercup Studios, Joey is showing Rachel around the set.

lines.Line: All right, and over there is Brady’s Pub where I like to unwind afterNEWLINEa long day of surgeoning
Wow! This is so amazing! What else? What else
Well, that is a large piece of television equipment. (Points at aNEWLINElarge piece of television equipment as an old man walks by.) And uh that is an oldNEWLINEman! Hey old man
All righty, what do you say we head back to my place
(laughs) Wow! Umm, y’know, I-I would really love to, but I-INEWLINEshouldn’t
Why? (In Drake’s voice.) Why can’t the world stop turning, justNEWLINEfor a moment? Just for us
(awestruck, then not) Isn’t that a line from the show?
(awestruck, then not) Isn’t that a line from the show?
(awestruck, then not) Isn’t that a line from the show?
Uh, yeah but uh, (In Drake’s voice) I may have said those thingsNEWLINEbefore but, I never truly meant them. Until now
That’s a line from the show too
That’s a line from the show too
Okay, you watch too much TV
Okay, you watch too much TV
(approaching) Here you go Joe, here’s the freshly squeezed orangeNEWLINEjuice you asked for. (Hands it to him.
Thanks! (Looks at it.) Yeah, there’s pulp in that. (Hands it back.
Thanks! (Looks at it.) Yeah, there’s pulp in that. (Hands it back.
I thought we talked about this. I don’t like pulp. No pulp. PulpNEWLINEisn’t juice. All juice, okay
I’m sorry, I guess I just like the pulp
I’m sorry, I guess I just like the pulp
Oh my God, I’m sorry, I’m being so rude. (Turns to Rachel.)NEWLINERachel, would like a soda or something? Because Chandler would run right out and get it
Yeah sure, iced tea would be great
Yeah sure, iced tea would be great
(To Rachel) Did I not just tell him
(To Rachel) Did I not just tell him
(mouthing it to him) Yes, you did
(mouthing it to him) Yes, you did

(To Chandler) Okay look, Chandler, if this (Motions back and forthNEWLINEindicating the arrangement.) you have got to listen! (Tugs on his ear.) (Chandler glaresNEWLINEat him.) You’re gonna throw that juice at me, aren’t ya
It’s not all juice! (Rachel quickly gets out of the way.

5.SceneDescription: Monica and Phoebe's, Monica is eating breakfast as Chandler enters.

lines.Line: Who sold a story to Archie Comics?
Oh my God! That’s great! Oh wow! (Hugs him.) You’re aNEWLINEpublished writer! I wish I had a present for you
Wait a minute! (Quickly checks her pockets and pulls out…) My last Kit-KatNEWLINEbar

lines.Character: (Chandler tries to take it, but Monica won’t let go. He tugs harder, and she stillNEWLINEdoesn’t budge
lines.Line: Chandler tries to take it, but Monica won’t let go. He tugs harder, and she stillNEWLINEdoesn’t budge.

(entering) Hey! Hey Chandler look, I know you’re mad, but I just wantNEWLINEto say I’m sorry. I-I was a total jerk. Completely o-over the line. Uh, I just I hateNEWLINEpulp! Y’know? I mean, y’know how Monica feels about low fat mayonnaise
Yeah, o-o-o-o-okay anyway, I just wanted to say I’m sorry. Here.NEWLINE(Hands him a cup.)
Fresh squeezed orange juice, with pulp! Just the way you like it
Hey Joey, Chandler sold a story to Archie Comics
Oh my God! That’s great! Congratulations! What’s the story?
Oh you wouldn’t uh, care. It’s just a stupid comic bookNEWLINEstory
Oh you wouldn’t uh, care. It’s just a stupid comic bookNEWLINEstory
Are you kidding me?! I love Archie! And the whole gang

Well uh, Archie needs money to fix his jalopy (Joey laughs), uh but heNEWLINEdoesn’t want Reggie to just give him the money. So Reggie hires him as hisNEWLINEassist—as his butler. And then makes him do all these crazy things like bring himNEWLINEmilkshakes that can’t have lumps in them
Wait a minute. That sounds a little familiar! Did they already do thatNEWLINEone? ‘Cause I think I read it

6.SceneDescription: The hospital, Ross and Monica are in Phoebe’s room. Phoebe is in theNEWLINEbathroom and Monica notices smoke coming out from underneath the door.

lines.Line: Phoebe, why is smoke coming out of the bathroom?
Oh yeah, the doctor said that could be one of the side effects.
No! It’s not a cigarette! The smoke is coming out of me
Okay! Okay! (Puts it out and comes out of the bathroom.) I’m soNEWLINEglad you’re here
Come on. (Helps her into bed as her phone rings.) I got it

lines.Character: (He does a kara-tay move to silence her, then answers the phone
lines.Line: He does a kara-tay move to silence her, then answers the phone.
(on the phone) Hello? (Listens.) No she can’t come to the phone rightNEWLINEnow. (Listens.) Oh, right no problem. Okay, bye-bye. (Hangs up.
Was it my work? Were they mad? Was it Jack? Did he yell?
Was it my work? Were they mad? Was it Jack? Did he yell?
J-j-just relax, nobody yelled. Jack just was calling to make sure that youNEWLINEwere getting better

7.SceneDescription: Ross and Carol's, Carol is working on something at the table and Ross isNEWLINEreading a newspaper on the couch.

lines.Line: So honey this uh, this threesome thing umm, I mean how-how are you gonnaNEWLINEstart to find
Ooh, actually I’ve been making a list of all the women I know whoNEWLINEmight be into doing this

Oh. (He takes the notepad she was using and looks at it.) Wow! (Flips toNEWLINEanother page.) Huh. (Flips another page.) Boy! (Flips another page.) Well, someone’sNEWLINEbeen doing their homework. (Flips two more pages.
Yeah. Ooh, and I know Gail Rosten is in there twice, but she is so
Yeah. Ooh, and I know Gail Rosten is in there twice, but she is so
Oh, I know. (Laughs) Y’know, just-just talking about it is getting meNEWLINEkinda
Yeah? Well, I-I think Ben’s asleep
Oh umm, y’know I think it would be better if we just save it
Yeah. Right. Save it. I can do that. (Gets up and does a little kara-tay.
Yeah. Right. Save it. I can do that. (Gets up and does a little kara-tay.

8.SceneDescription: Joey's apartment, (The one he had when he was Dr. Drake Remoray, because heNEWLINEstill is.) Rachel is there and admiring the big ceramic fake dog.

lines.Line: Ohh, I mean it’s just so realistic
I know. (Joey is sitting in this tall chair that is made up of balls onNEWLINEpolls. You’ll have to see it to know what I mean.) Yeah, his name is Pat
Pat the dog. Oh! Oh! I get it!! (Laughs and finishes her drink.
Pat the dog. Oh! Oh! I get it!! (Laughs and finishes her drink.
(climbing down from his chair) Do you uh, do you—ready for a refill
Oh, I probably shouldn’t—so I will! (Joey starts making herNEWLINErefill and Rachel notices that rain thing Joey has.) Oh! Wow! It’s like it’sNEWLINEraining
Pretty cool, huh? But if you’re thinking you can put a fish in thereNEWLINEand it wouldn’t get sucked up into the mechanism, well you’d be wrong
Umm, can I use your bathroom
Umm, can I use your bathroom
Umm, can I use your bathroom
Umm, can I use your bathroom
Okay. (Starts to go.) God y’know, if someone told me a week agoNEWLINEthat I would be peeing in Joey Tribbiani’s apartment
Yeah, life’s pretty great isn’t it
Yeah, life’s pretty great isn’t it
Yeah, life’s pretty great isn’t it

lines.Line: We’re really gonna do this, huh
Y’know, if, if this is too weird for you, we can still back outNEWLINEat… (A knock on the door interrupts him.
(jumping up to get it) I got it
(jumping up to get it) I got it
(opening the door) Susan! Hi! (Who’d you think it was gonna be?
Thank you so much for coming
Thank you so much for coming
Oh, I wouldn’t miss it for the world
Oh, I wouldn’t miss it for the world

lines.Character: (They start moving towards the bedroom, never taking their eyes off each other. TheyNEWLINEmove past Ross and stop

(not taking her eyes off Carol) Hello Ross. (Takes off her coat and handsNEWLINEit to him.) I love what you’ve done with this space

lines.Character: (They disappear into the bedroom leaving Ross standing in the living room holdingNEWLINESusan’s coat
lines.Line: They disappear into the bedroom leaving Ross standing in the living room holdingNEWLINESusan’s coat.

10.SceneDescription: Joey's apartment, Rachel is now three sheets to the wind and Joey is watchingNEWLINEher.

lines.Line: Joey, you’re such an amazing actor! (He smiles.) How do you knowNEWLINEwhere Dr. Drake Remoray leaves off and Joey Tribbiani begins
Well, with Dr. Drake they always tell me what to say. And with Joey, INEWLINEpretty much have to make it up on my own
Wow! Tell me something Joey—(She falls off the couch)—Whoa! INEWLINEjust fell right off the couch there
Okay. (She climbs back onto the couch.)
Here you go. Let me ask you a question
Here you go. Let me ask you a question
When was the last time someone told you just how beautiful you are
Wow! I can’t, I can’t feel my hands
Wow! I can’t, I can’t feel my hands

lines.Line: I know! I’ll tell you something, we are gonna do that again
Oh, okay! (He rolls over to do that again.
Oh, okay! (He rolls over to do that again.

lines.Line: I thought I’d try to take a walk. Would you pour me some water?NEWLINEI’ll be back soon
Whoa-whoa-whoa! You’re not gonna use the pay phone to call work, areNEWLINEya

lines.Character: (She goes out into the hall and when she’s there and the door is closed; she ripsNEWLINEoff her robe to reveal her work clothes
lines.Line: She goes out into the hall and when she’s there and the door is closed; she ripsNEWLINEoff her robe to reveal her work clothes.

Let’s go! Come on! Move it! (Grabs her coat.) Come on! (To an oldNEWLINEman who’s holding her shoes and briefcase.) Shoes! Briefcase! (Takes them both.)NEWLINEThanks Lou, good luck with the gall bladder. (She leaves.

lines.Character: [Cut back to her room, Joey and Ross are sitting there waiting for her
lines.Line: Cut back to her room, Joey and Ross are sitting there waiting for her.

lines.Character: [Cut back to her room, Joey and Ross are sitting there waiting for her
lines.Line: Cut back to her room, Joey and Ross are sitting there waiting for her.
Hey Joe did… Did you ever have a threesome
Hey Joe did… Did you ever have a threesome
(not quite sure of how to answer that) Well uh, look Ross I uh, I thinkNEWLINECarol’s great and I’m sure you’re a very attractive man, but I…
No! The reason I’m asking is that… I sorta had one last night
All right! So, was it amazing
Just okay—Did you do it right?
Just okay—Did you do it right?
Look, it’s just did, did you ever go to a party and think,NEWLINEWould really anyone miss me if I weren’t here
Huh. But still Ross, you’re worst day with two women, pretty muchNEWLINEbetter than any other day! Y’know what I mean
It’s just, my part seemed to be over pretty quickly and then, andNEWLINEthen there was a lot of waiting around
But you got to be with both of them, right
But you got to be with both of them, right
Not-not really. Th-th-there was just Carol
No, she kept kicking me away
No, she kept kicking me away
Well hey, at least you got to see a lot of stuff, right
Oh I a lot of stuff
Oh I a lot of stuff
Oh I a lot of stuff
A little. Yeah. I made a snack
A little. Yeah. I made a snack
Just a sandwich. Turkey, a little mustard

lines.Line: You-you-you said you were gonna be away all weekend

14.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Ross is there as Rachel storms in.

lines.Line: Well, if you see him, will you please tell him that I’m looking forNEWLINEhim and that this I am not gonna throw up
That-that’s always good news. Are you okay
That-that’s always good news. Are you okay
Me? I’m great! I’m fine! I’m sooo good!! But, you knowNEWLINEwho’s not great?! Men! You’re a man right Ross?

Let me uh, let me ask you something, do wedding vows mean squatNEWLINEto you people?! And why is it that the second we tell you we’re going out ofNEWLINEtown, bamn there you are in bed with the neighbor’s dog walker?
No seriously! Seriously! What has happened to the sanctity ofNEWLINEmarriage
Didn’t you spend last night at Joey’s
Didn’t you spend last night at Joey’s
Aw what are you?! A detective
Aw what are you?! A detective
Look I-I don’t know what’s going on with you and your husbandNEWLINEand what is hopefully an adult dog walker, look can I just say not all men are like that

Hey! There are some men who will do whatever it takes to make theirNEWLINEmarriage work! Okay? There are some men who will stand by and-and watch as their wivesNEWLINEengage in-in what only can be described as a twosome with some-some woman sheNEWLINEbarely knows from the gym
Well, you might want to tell him it sounds like his wife is (whispers)NEWLINEgay
She is not… (Realizes) She’s gay. Oh my God. She is soNEWLINEgay! I can’t believe this
Good day for married people huh
Good day for married people huh
Good day for married people huh
I’m sorry your husband cheated on you
I’m sorry your husband cheated on you
I’m sorry your wife is gay. I guess women aren’t that greatNEWLINEeither

15.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Phoebe is singing a new song as the gang looks on.
